pkgmetadata.longdescription: Change-Point Analysis of High-Dimensional Time Series via Binary Segmentation // Binary segmentation methods for detecting and estimating multiple change-points in the mean or second-order structure of high-dimensional time series as described in Cho and Fryzlewicz (2014) doi:10.1111/rssb.12079 and Cho (2016) doi:10.1214/16-EJS1155.
